AffordableHousingTaxCreditsAndOtherTaxBe.label: Affordable Housing Tax Credits and Other Tax Benefits, Amount
AffordableHousingTaxCreditsAndOtherTaxBe.description: Amount of affordable housing tax credits and other tax benefits recognized.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesAdjustment.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Adjustments, Other
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesAdjustment.description: Amount of other addition (reduction) in allowance reserve for credit loss.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesLoansAcqui.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Loans Acquired
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesLoansAcqui.description: Amount of addition to allowance reserve for credit loss arising from purchase of loan and lease portfolios.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteOffs.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Write-offs
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteOffs.description: Amount of loans and leases that have been written off from both loan receivables and allowance reserve for credit loss.

AmountRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Amount Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit) and Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, before Tax
AmountRecognizedInNetPeriodicBenefitCost.description: Amount recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) and other comprehensive (income) loss.

CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPur.label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Other Cash Flows Received on Retained Interests (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPur.description: This amount represents total cash flows received from retained interests by the transferor other than servicing fees. Other cash flows include, for example, all cash flows from interest-only strips and cash above the minimum required level in cash collateral accounts.

CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPur.label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Purchases of Previously Transferred Financial Assets (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPur.description: The amount of cash outflow used to purchase previously transferred financial assets (or its underlying collateral), including delinquent or foreclosed assets, from the securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement SPE.

CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPur.label: Cash Flows Between Securitization or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Special Purpose Entity (SPE) and Transferor, Servicing Fees Received (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
CashFlowsBetweenSecuritizationSpecialPur.description: The amount of servicing fees from the securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement SPE.

CollateralAlreadyPostedAggregateFairValu.label: Collateral Already Posted, Aggregate Fair Value
CollateralAlreadyPostedAggregateFairValu.description: The aggregate fair value of assets that are already posted, at the end of the reporting period, as collateral for derivative instruments with credit-risk-related contingent features.

CreditDerivativeCurrentFairValue.label: Credit Derivative, Current Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
CreditDerivativeCurrentFairValue.description: Discloses the fair value of the credit derivative (or each group of similar credit derivatives) as of the date of the statement of financial position.

CreditDerivativeMaximumExposureUndiscoun.label: Credit Derivative, Maximum Exposure, Undiscounted
CreditDerivativeMaximumExposureUndiscoun.description: Maximum potential amount of future undiscounted payments that could be required under the credit derivative, before reduction for potential recoveries under recourse or collateralization provisions.

CreditRiskDerivativeAssetsAtFairValue.label: Credit Risk Derivative Assets, at Fair Value
CreditRiskDerivativeAssetsAtFairValue.description: Fair value of credit risk derivative asset.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsF.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Foreign
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsF.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible foreign tax credit carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsO.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsO.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Loss Reserves
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from loss reserves other than estimated credit losses.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Provision for Loan Losses
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the provision for loan losses.

DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherCompre.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Accumulated Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, before Tax
DefinedBenefitPlanAccumulatedOtherCompre.description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCost.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit)
DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCost.description: Amount of net periodic benefit cost (credit) for defined benefit plan.

DerivativeCreditRiskValuationAdjustmentD.label: Derivative Credit Risk Valuation Adjustment, Derivative Assets
DerivativeCreditRiskValuationAdjustmentD.description: Amount of credit risk valuation adjustment to derivative assets to properly reflect the credit quality of the counterparties.

DerivativeCreditRiskValuationAdjustmentD.label: Derivative Credit Risk Valuation Adjustment, Derivative Liabilities
DerivativeCreditRiskValuationAdjustmentD.description: Amount of credit risk valuation adjustment to derivative liabilities to properly reflect the credit quality of the entity.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other tax credits.

ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensati.label: Excess Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation, Financing Activities
ExcessTaxBenefitFromShareBasedCompensati.description: Amount of cash inflow from realized tax benefit related to deductible compensation cost reported on the entity's tax return for equity instruments in excess of the compensation cost for those instruments recognized for financial reporting purposes.

FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisL.label: Fair Value, Assets Measured on Recurring Basis, Loans Receivable (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisL.description: This element represents a certain statement of financial position asset caption which represents a class of assets, or which may include an individual asset, measured at fair value on a recurring basis.

FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnAs.label: Fair Value, Option, Credit Risk, Gains (Losses) on Assets
FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnAs.description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains or losses included in earnings during the period attributable to changes in instrument-specific credit risk arising from loans and other receivables held as assets.

FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnLi.label: Fair Value, Option, Credit Risk, Gains (Losses) on Liabilities (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FairValueOptionCreditRiskGainsLossesOnLi.description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings that are attributable to changes in the instrument-specific credit risk of liabilities with fair values that have been significantly affected during the reporting period by changes in the instrument-specific credit risk.

FeesAndCommissionsCreditAndDebitCards.label: Fees and Commissions, Credit and Debit Cards (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FeesAndCommissionsCreditAndDebitCards.description: Amount of income earned from credit card services (including late, over limit, and annual fees) and debit card services (including interchange fees, annual fees and other fees). Excludes interest income earned on credit card balances and transactions.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCol.label: Financial Instruments Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Amount Eligible to be Repledged by Counterparty
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCol.description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions where counterparty has the right to re-pledge such.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCol.label: Financial Instruments Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Amount Not Eligible to be Repledged by Counterparty
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedAndPledgedAsCol.description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions where counterparty does not have the right to re-pledge such.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: The valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Losses, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of valuation allowance for financing receivables that are expected to be uncollectible that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff, after Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount, after recovery, of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableChangeInPresentValueE.label: Financing Receivable, Change in Present Value, Expense (Reversal)
FinancingReceivableChangeInPresentValueE.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on financing receivable, from change in present value of expected cash flows.

FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Collectively Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableCollectivelyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were collectively evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.label: Financing Receivable, Individually Evaluated for Impairment
FinancingReceivableIndividuallyEvaluated.description: The balance of financing receivables that were individually evaluated for impairment.

FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.label: Financing Receivable, Reclassification to Held-for-sale
FinancingReceivableReclassificationToHel.description: Amount of financing receivable reclassified to held-for-sale.

FinancingReceivableSignificantPurchases.label: Financing Receivable, Purchase
FinancingReceivableSignificantPurchases.description: Amount of increase from purchase of financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableSignificantSales.label: Financing Receivable, Sale
FinancingReceivableSignificantSales.description: Amount of decrease from sale and reclassification to held-for-sale of financing receivable.

GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Mortgage Loans
GainLossOnSaleOfMortgageLoans.description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

GainLossOnSaleOfNotesReceivable.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Financing Receivable
GainLossOnSaleOfNotesReceivable.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable.

GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Average Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableAverageRecord.description: Average amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Accrual Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.description: Amount of interest income recognized that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Cash Basis Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.description: Amount of interest income recognized on a cash-basis method of accounting that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Related Allowance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRelatedAllowa.description: Amount of allowance for credit losses related to recorded investment.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

IncomeTaxCreditsAndAdjustments.label: Income Tax Credits and Adjustments
IncomeTaxCreditsAndAdjustments.description: A credit or adjustment for government or taxing authority authorized decrease in taxes owed as a result of meeting certain tax policy conditions.

IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity
IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.description: The sum of the tax effects of all items occurring during the period that have been charged or credited directly to other comprehensive income or to related components of shareholders' equity.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestExpenseCommercialPaper.label: Interest Expense, Commercial Paper
InterestExpenseCommercialPaper.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on commercial paper.

InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor for operating lease.

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Five
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Four
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year One
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in remainder of current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, after Year Five
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Three
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Two
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercial.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercial.description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans and leases receivable includes, but not limited to, commercial and industrial loans, agricultural loans, mortgage loans, promissory notes, interbank and other loans to financial institutions, draws against credit facilities, trade financing, lease financings. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialGovern.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Governments (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableCommercialGovern.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases issued to a unit or agency of a federal, state or local jurisdiction within the country of domicile of the reporting entity. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumer.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumer.description: Amount before allowance of consumer loans, including, but not limited to, mortgage, home equity, vehicles, credit card, installment, and lease financing. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerMortgage.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Mortgage (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerMortgage.description: Amount before allowance of consumer mortgage. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes subordinated loans such as home equity lines of credit and loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerOther.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Other (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerOther.description: Amount before allowance of consumer loans and leases not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerRevolvin.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Consumer, Revolving, Credit Card (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableConsumerRevolvin.description: Amount before allowance of credit card loans issued to individuals. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncome.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncome.description: Amount of deferred interest and fee income, unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedAllowanc.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Allowance for Loan Losses (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedAllowanc.description: Reflects amount of allowance for credit losses pertaining to impaired loans.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedAverageI.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Average Investment (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedAverageI.description: Reflects the average recorded investment in impaired loans during each period.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedEndOfPer.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, End of Period, in Allowance for Loan Loss (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedEndOfPer.description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans which have been written down and for which there is a related reserve for credit loss.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedEndOfPer.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, End of Period, Not in Allowance for Loan Loss (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedEndOfPer.description: Reflects the carrying amount of loans which have been written down and for which there is no related reserve for credit loss.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedInterest.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Impaired, Interest Income Recognized (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableImpairedInterest.description: Reflects the amount of interest income on impaired and nonperforming loans that was recognized as income during the reporting period.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net of Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableOther.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross, Other (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableOther.description: Amount before allowance of other loans and leases not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansReceivableCommercialAndIndustrial.label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial and Industrial (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableCommercialAndIndustrial.description: Amount before allowance of loans issued to commercial and industrial institutions. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes real estate loans and loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansReceivableCommercialRealEstate.label: Loans Receivable, Gross, Commercial, Real Estate (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableCommercialRealEstate.description: Amount before allowance of commercial loans issued to businesses to acquire, develop, construct, improve, or refinance land or building. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

LoansReceivableNet.label: Loans Receivable, Net (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
LoansReceivableNet.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes loans held for sale. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCostOfMortgages.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Cost of Mortgage Sold
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateCostOfMortgages.description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from sale.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NoninterestIncomeOther.label: Noninterest Income, Other
NoninterestIncomeOther.description: Represents the total of noninterest income derived from certain activities and assets including (for example): (1) venture capital investments; (2) bank owned life insurance; (3) foreign currency transactions; and (4) mortgage servicing rights.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

OccupancyNet.label: Occupancy, Net
OccupancyNet.description: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementSubleaseRe.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Sublease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementSubleaseRe.description: The amount of revenue recognized for the period under subleasing arrangements.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseSubleaseRental.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Sublease Rentals
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseSubleaseRental.description: The total amount of sublease rental income recognized during the period that reduces the entity's rent expense incurred under operating leases.

OriginationOfMortgageServicingRightsMSRs.label: Origination of Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSRs) (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OriginationOfMortgageServicingRightsMSRs.description: The increase during the reporting period in the cumulative value of servicing rights. This increase is the result of new servicing rights that are created when mortgages are sold or transferred.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPer.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPer.description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Before Tax, for the period. The pretax revenues, expenses, gains, and losses that under generally accepted accounting principles are included in comprehensive income, but excluded from net income. Includes the entity's proportionate share of an investee's equity adjustments for other comprehensive income. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.label: Payments for Origination and Purchases of Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans and Leases
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.label: Principal Amount Outstanding of Loans Held-in-portfolio
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.description: This is the result of the principal amount outstanding of total loans managed or securitized less securitized loans and loans that are in the process of being securitized.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansSecurit.description: This is the principal amount outstanding for securitized loans only (across all types of loans).

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansAndLeasesHeldForI.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansAndLeasesHeldForI.description: The net cash inflow from (a) sales of loans held-for-investment, (b) sales of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both. Includes proceeds from securitizations of loans.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

ProvisionForOtherLosses.label: Provision for Other Losses
ProvisionForOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related to other loss.

QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationAss.label: Qualitative and Quantitative Information, Transferor's Continuing Involvement, Principal Amount Outstanding (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
QualitativeAndQuantitativeInformationAss.description: The total principal outstanding of financial assets transferred in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer that has been accounted for as sales and in which the transferor continues to have involvement, including both the derecognized and recognized portion of such transferred assets.

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.label: Securities Loaned, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedAsset.label: Securities Loaned, Asset
SecuritiesLoanedAsset.description: Amount of asset associated with securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral.

SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.label: Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Cash
SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.label: Securities Loaned, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
SecuritiesLoanedCollateralRightToReclaim.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedFairValueOfCollateral.label: Securities Loaned, Fair Value of Collateral
SecuritiesLoanedFairValueOfCollateral.description: Fair value of the securities pledged as collateral against securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedGrossIncludingNotSubject.label: Securities Loaned, Gross Including Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
SecuritiesLoanedGrossIncludingNotSubject.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettin.label: Securities Loaned, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement Deduction
SecuritiesLoanedNotSubjectToMasterNettin.description: Amount of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from securities loaned.

SecuritiesLoanedOffsetAgainstCollateralN.label: Securities Loaned, Offset Against Collateral, Net of Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Policy Election
SecuritiesLoanedOffsetAgainstCollateralN.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral, offset against a right to receive collateral.

SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes purchases of participations in pools of securities that are subject to a resale agreement, assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Gross
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Gross Including Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset.

SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.description: Amount of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement Deduction
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.description: Amount of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from securities purchased under agreements to resell.

SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralFairV.label: Security Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Fair Value
SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralFairV.description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions.

SegmentReportingInformationProvisionForC.label: Segment Reporting Information, Provision for Credit Losses (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationProvisionForC.description: Amount of the periodic provision charged to operations for the reportable segment, based on an assessment of the uncollectibility of the loan and lease portfolio and other estimated probable credit losses. Is disclosed if the amount (a) is included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) is otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

SubleaseIncome.label: Sublease Income
SubleaseIncome.description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.label: Tax Adjustments, Settlements, and Unusual Provisions
TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Change in Tax Rate, Provisional Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Provisional Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Provisional Income Tax Expense (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense for which accounting for tax effect from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesRecoveries.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Addition, Recovery
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesRecoveries.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from recovery of amount previously written off or reestablishment of reserve previously utilized.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.
